WorkItem.ClosedComment: User reports use of old files causing problem, generated new files and it started to work again
WorkItem.Description:
when i try to load my characters (any of them) from armory no matter which server they are on it is returning the following error:
Â 
Get Character - No Character Returned From Armory is armory down?

Comments.Message: Please attach your saved character profile(s) so that we may attempt to resolve the issue.
I am having this issue as well and do not have any saved character profiles.  2.3.3 loads just fine, however.

Correction- I had this issue with 2.3.5.  Apparently I had some old profiles that was keeping the program from being able to pull from the Armory, because once I got rid of my saved profiles and upgrade lists, it worked like normal.
